item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi there ðŸ‘‹ I break stuff so people that build stuff can build better stuff that breaks less. To contact me or learn more about me, check out the links below. Thanks for reading! Scumdestroy at Github @Kurogai&rsquo;s 100 Red Team Projects Challenge, around 75% done [Web and API Hacking, Burp Suite Notes and Methodology]{https://github.com/scumdestroy/Infosec-Corruption} Articles at Medium Open Source Contributions Hackingthe.cloud - Pentesting Cloud Platforms Knowledge Base Tomnomnom&rsquo;s GF Tool Bug Bounty I am a member of a couple invite-only bug bounty platforms
